Titan
An Online Health Care Products Store, This Platform is a software suite of products to build and operate the multi-level marketing (MLM) business which is built from the ground up using Microservice based Architecture. It is a cluster of portals having independent microservices each like Shopping Sites, Stores, Product Catalogs, Customer Management, Order Management, Content management (CMS), Single Sign On (SSO), Payment Systems in worldwide markets

Projects
Health Savings Account

HSA – Fidelity has been in the HSA business from 2006. HSA offered for DC clients in the mid-market and segments who signed up for a High Deductible health plan. HSA consists of three offering type like Self- Service, Standalone and guided. It is the leading-edge product for fidelity.

FS-RA – Flexible spending account is an account used to pay for out-of-pocket medical expenses and is funded by the employee. Reimbursement account is an account used to pay for out-of-pocket medical expenses funded by employer. . The in-fight stacked card feature is the current industry demand for a simplified “one stop shop” debit card solution for all HSA and RA.
